ingredients: ½ pound (250 grams) spicy cooking chorizo, chopped
Enough tortilla chips to cover a baking tray with chips
½ pound (250 grams) shredded cheese (I used a mix of monterey jack and cheddar)
green salsa, for serving (use a canned salsa or the recipe below)
1 poblano pepper, stem removed and seeded
½ medium onion, peeled and roughly chopped
